The interface groups the available actions in the following functional areas:
The actions on the left side of the upper toolbar allows you to show or hide the side panel and switch between the Edit and Review modes
The actions on the right side of the upper toolbar include Undo, Redo, Errors, Save, and Find/Replace buttons.
The lower toolbar provides mode-specific actions. For example, in Review mode the lower toolbar includes arrow buttons to skip to the previous or next comment or tracked change, and a button to Add comment.
A mode-specific side panel that includes tabs to switch between the Review, Actions, Attributes, and Search views. For example, the Edit mode includes all four views, while the Review mode does not include the Actions view.
